S

ScoreBoard - Class in Model.ScoreBoard
ScoreBoard is a class representing a real life scoreboard, basically a two-dimensional grid of numbers, where the each cell may be filled with a number, be empty or crossed over.
ScoreBoard(int, int) - Constructor for class Model.ScoreBoard.ScoreBoard
Class constructor specifying the number of rows and columns the scoreboard should have
ScoreBoardCell - Class in Model.ScoreBoard
ScoreBoardCell is a class representing a single cell of a ScoreBoard.
ScoreBoardCell() - Constructor for class Model.ScoreBoard.ScoreBoardCell
Class default constructor, sets the cell to its' default value (empty and not crossed over)
setActive(boolean) - Method in class View.GameScreen.PlayerPanel
Sets whether it's a players turn or not
setCombinations(DiceCombination[]) - Method in class View.GameScreen.GameScreen
Sets what combinations to use to create the CombinationButtons.
setCrossed(boolean) - Method in class Model.ScoreBoard.ScoreBoardCell
Sets the crossed state
setDice(DiceCollection) - Method in class View.GameScreen.GameScreen
Sets what dice to use to create the DiceButtons.
setPlayers(ArrayList<YatzyPlayer>) - Method in class View.GameScreen.GameScreen
Sets what players to use to create the playerPanels.
setPlayers(ArrayList<YatzyPlayer>) - Method in class View.WinScreen.WinScreen
Sets what players scoreboards to show
setScreen(YatzyScreen) - Method in class View.YatzyWindow
Sets the view/"screen" of the window
setSelectedAction(PlayerAction) - Method in class View.GameScreen.GameScreen
Sets what radiobutton associated with a specific action to be selected.
setValue(int) - Method in class Model.Dice.Dice
Sets the value of the current up-facing side of this Dice
setValue(Integer) - Method in class Model.ScoreBoard.ScoreBoardCell
Sets the value of the cell
setWinner(YatzyPlayer) - Method in class View.WinScreen.WinScreen
Sets what player to display as the winner
standard() - Static method in class Model.Dice.Dice
Static constructor
start() - Method in class Controller.Yatzy
Starts a new game
